p: In conclusion, this study classifies 27 plants belonging to 12 families: Lamiaceae (7 species), Asteraceae (6 species), Umbellifereae (3 species), Apiaceae (3 species), Rutaceae, Anacardiaceae, Bignoniaceae, Euphorbiaceae, Hypericaceae, Lauraceae, Poaceae and Zingiberaceae. Those plants allow giving the essential oils which have been studied by their hepatoprotective activity.
